item.title: Linux - Set Encoding In Linux Environment
item.description: Linux - Set Encoding In Linux Environment Add export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 export LANG=en_US.UTF-8 export LANGUAGE=en_US.UTF-8 in .bashrc or .zshrc Refer - How to set up a clean UTF-8 environment in Linux
